articles.title: Imagining the future of banking with agentic AI

articles.content: Agentic AI is coming of age. And with it comes new opportunities in the financial services sector. articles.title: Atlassian to buy Arc developer The Browser Company for $610M
articles.summary: The Browser Company's CEO Josh Miller said that his company will operate independently under Atlassian and will continue to develop Dia, the browser it started working on last year after deciding to s.
articles.content: The Browser Company's CEO Josh Miller said that his company will operate independently under Atlassian and will continue to develop Dia, the browser it started working on last year after deciding to stop development of its previous browser, Arc.

articles.title: DuckDuckGo adds access to advanced AI models to its subscription plan
articles.summary: 99 per month plan, users will be able to access newer models, including OpenAI’s GPT-4o and GPT-5, Anthropic’s Claude Sonnet 4, and Meta’s Llama Maverick.
articles.content: With DuckDuckGo's $9.99 per month plan, users will be able to access newer models, including OpenAI’s GPT-4o and GPT-5, Anthropic’s Claude Sonnet 4, and Meta’s Llama Maverick.
